articles.author: Rachel Pannett, Kelsey Ables
articles.title: The global reaction to Trump’s tariffs, in 10 candid quotes - The Washington Post
articles.description: The punitive tariffs drew strong reactions from world leaders. Australia’s prime minister said they had “no basis in logic. ... This is not the act of a friend.”
articles.content:
President Donald Trumps sprawling new tariff regime sent world markets plunging and officials reeling at the prospect of a global trade war.
The punitive tariffs roiled rivals and allies alike. This… [+6179 chars]
